name: Divider
description:
A top-down action combat rougelike that fits both of the themes (Leaderboard and One room)

Game tutorial is in-game on Main menu.

External Assets:

  • Character Models/Animations and VFX (aura and lightning) - Unity asset store
  • Royalty free stat Icons - game-icons.net

I wrote all the code myself...unfortunately couldn't add music/sounds as it's 6am right now and I'm tired lol.
